name: Grand Ouvert 2
overview: A German language card game for up to 3 players, it is a sequel to Grand Ouvert and was created by Manfred Leidorf and Peter W. H. Arnold. As before, only only children are allowed to play skat, but solo gamblers are now offered three different gaming tables and two decks of cards (German/French). Also new are three levels of difficulty, so that even the experienced card knocker can find suitable players. Now quickly set whether Kontra/Re is allowed to be played and the CPU distributes the hands.
